children.name: Adapter
children.definition: A device designed to make different pieces of apparatus compatible

children.name: Amplifier
children.definiton: An electronic device designed to take an input signal and output an increased signal strength.

children.name: Analyzer
children.definiton: A device used to analyse data, signals, equipment performance, etc., or to measure and collect data for analysis.

children.name: Aspirator
children.definiton: A device that aspirates, breathes, or blows upon; A device that draws a stream of air or gas through a tube.
